events.Showed Mido Sword & Shield: open_forest == 'open' or (is_child and Kokiri_Sword and Buy_Deku_Shield)

locations.GS Kokiri Know It All House:
is_child and at_night and 
                (had_night_start or can_leave_forest or can_play(Suns_Song)) and can_child_attack
locations.GS Kokiri House of Twins:
is_adult and at_night and 
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_isg)

exits.Outside Deku Tree: 'Showed Mido Sword & Shield' or Sticks or is_adult

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Deku Tree Lobby: is_child or (is_adult and has_explosives and Hover_Boots)

locations.GS Lost Woods Above Stage: is_adult and at_night and (here(can_plant_bean) or can_use(Longshot) or (has_bombchus and Progressive_Hookshot) or can_hover)

exits.Sacred Forest Meadow:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or has_explosives or 
                Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

locations.GS Sacred Forest Meadow: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover) and at_night and is_adult

exits.Field Valley Grotto: (is_child and has_explosives) or (is_adult and (Hammer or (has_explosives and can_shield)))

locations.Pierre: is_adult and Bonooru and not free_scarecrow
locations.Lake Hylia Sun:
is_adult and 
                (can_use(Distant_Scarecrow) or 'Water Temple Clear' or can_hover) and can_use(Bow)
locations.GS Lake Hylia Lab Wall: is_child and (Boomerang or can_jumpslash) and at_night

exits.Fishing Hole: is_child or can_use(Scarecrow) or here(can_plant_bean) or 'Water Temple Clear' or can_isg

locations.Diving in the Lab:
(Progressive_Scale, 2) or
                (Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot)) or (has_bottle and can_use(Hover_Boots))

locations.Gerudo Valley Crate Freestanding PoH:
is_child or can_use(Longshot) or 
                at('Gerudo Valley Far Side', (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega) and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or has_bottle or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

exits.Gerudo Valley Far Side:
( is_child and (can_jumpslash or can_mega) )
                or ( is_adult and (can_ride_epona or can_use(Hookshot) or gerudo_fortress == 'open' or can_mega))

locations.Gerudo Fortress Rooftop Chest:
(is_child and can_mega) or 
                (is_adult and can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Scarecrow) or can_use(Longshot) or can_mega)
locations.Horseback Archery 1000 Points: Gerudo_Membership_Card and can_ride_epona and Bow and is_adult
locations.Horseback Archery 1500 Points: Gerudo_Membership_Card and can_ride_epona and Bow and is_adult

exits.Haunted Wasteland:
is_child or 'Gerudo Fortress Gate Open' or
                ((Progressive_Hookshot and (Hover_Boots or can_mega)) or (can_isg and Bombs) )

locations.GS Wasteland Ruins: can_use(Boomerang) or (is_adult and (Progressive_Hookshot or (Bombs and can_shield)))

locations.Colossus Freestanding PoH:
(is_adult and here(can_plant_bean)) or
                at('Mirror Shield Hand', can_mega) or
                at('Silver Gauntlets Hand', can_mega)

exits.Ganons Castle Fairy: can_use(Golden_Gauntlets) or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5)) or can_use(Hover_Boots)

events.Mask of Truth:
'Skull Mask' and
                at('Lost Woods', is_child and can_play(Sarias_Song)) and
                at('Graveyard', is_child and at_day) and
                at('Hyrule Field', is_child and Kokiri_Emerald and Goron_Ruby and Zora_Sapphire)

region_name: Castle Town Man in Green House

locations.Sheik in Kakariko: is_adult and Forest_Medallion and Fire_Medallion and Water_Medallion
locations.GS Kakariko Watchtower:
at_night and 
                is_child and (Slingshot or has_bombchus or 
                    ( (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and
                    ( can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love) ) ) )

exits.Bottom of the Well:
(is_child and ('Drain Well' or can_jumpslash or can_isg or Nuts))
                or (is_adult and has_explosives)
exits.Kakariko Bombable Grotto:
can_blast_or_smash and 
                (is_adult or 
                    (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)))

locations.Graveyard Freestanding PoH:
(is_adult and here(can_plant_bean)) or
                can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover

exits.Composer Grave: can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or at('Shadow Temple Warp Region', True)
exits.Dampes Grave: is_adult or at('Shadow Temple Warp Region', True)

locations.Composer Grave Chest: has_fire_source or (is_child and Sticks and (can_live_dmg(0.75) or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))
locations.Song from Composer Grave:
is_adult or 
                (Slingshot or Boomerang or Sticks or 
                    has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword)

locations.Death Mountain Bombable Chest:
can_blast_or_smash or can_jumpslash or
                (is_child and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)
locations.DM Trail Freestanding PoH:
is_child or can_live_dmg(0.5) or 
                can_use(Nayrus_Love) or Fairy or Hover_Boots

exits.Death Mountain Summit: here(can_blast_or_smash) or (is_child and can_isg) or can_use(Hookshot)

locations.Biggoron:
is_adult and
                (Claim_Check or (
                    at('Death Mountain Crater Upper', is_adult) and
                    at('Zoras Domain', is_adult) and (
                        Eyedrops or Eyeball_Frog or Prescription or Broken_Sword or
                        at('Gerudo Valley Far Side', is_adult and (
                            Poachers_Saw or Odd_Mushroom or Cojiro or Pocket_Cucco or Pocket_Egg)))))

events.Goron City Woods Warp Open: can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Bow) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade

locations.Goron City Leftmost Maze Chest:
can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or has_explosives) and can_shield)
                or (has_explosives and can_use(Hover_Boots))
locations.Goron City Left Maze Chest: can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and can_shield)
locations.Goron City Right Maze Chest: can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and can_shield)
locations.Goron City Pot Freestanding PoH:
is_child and 
                (has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) and 
                (( (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or can_shield) and Sticks) or can_use(Dins_Fire))
locations.Link the Goron:
is_adult and 
                (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or has_explosives or Bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or Blue_Fire)
locations.Goron City Maze Gossip Stone: can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and can_shield)

exits.Goron Shop:
has_explosives or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or can_use(Bow) or 
                (is_child and (can_use(Dins_Fire) or (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and Sticks)))
exits.Darunias Chamber:
(is_child and (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or has_explosives) and can_shield))) or 
                    (is_adult and (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or has_explosives or Bow))
exits.Goron City Grotto:
can_hover or (
                is_adult and 
                ( (can_play(Song_of_Time) and 
                    (can_live_dmg(1) or can_use(Goron_Tunic) or can_use(Longshot) or can_use(Nayrus_Love)) ) or 
                ((can_live_dmg(0.5) or can_use(Goron_Tunic)) and can_use(Hookshot)) or 
                ((can_use(Nayrus_Love) or can_use(Goron_Tunic)) and can_use(Hookshot))))

exits.Goron City: can_leave_forest and 'Goron City Woods Warp Open'

exits.Death Mountain Crater Lower:
is_adult or
                (is_child and
                    (can_mega or (can_live_dmg(0.5) and has_explosives) or can_shield))

exits.Death Mountain Crater Central:
(is_child and can_mega and (can_live_dmg(1) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)) and Hylian_Shield) or
                (is_adult and can_use(Goron_Tunic) and (can_use(Distant_Scarecrow) or can_mega) and 
                (can_live_dmg(1) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)))

locations.DM Crater Volcano Freestanding PoH:
(is_adult and here(can_plant_bean)) or
                can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega

exits.Death Mountain Crater Lower:
(is_adult and here(can_plant_bean)) or
                can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot)

locations.Frog Ocarina Game:
is_child and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and can_play(Sarias_Song) and 
                can_play(Suns_Song) and can_play(Eponas_Song) and 
                can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_play(Song_of_Storms)
locations.GS Zora River Near Raised Grottos: is_adult and (Progressive_Hookshot or can_hover) and at_night

exits.Lost Woods: can_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots) or (is_child and (can_isg or Nuts)) or can_mega
exits.Zoras Domain: can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or can_mega or can_use(Hover_Boots) or is_child

locations.GS Zora's Domain Frozen Waterfall:
is_adult and at_night and (Progressive_Hookshot or Bow or Magic_Meter or has_explosives or 
                Biggoron_Sword or 
                at('Goron City', is_adult and Progressive_Wallet and (can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or Blue_Fire)))

exits.Zoras Fountain:
zora_fountain == 'open' or Deliver_Letter
                or is_adult or (can_shield and has_bombchus)

locations.GS Zora's Fountain Hidden Cave:
at_night and 
                (
                ((can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) and can_blast_or_smash) or (has_explosives and can_shield and (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot))))
                    or (has_explosives and can_shield)
                ) and (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover)

exits.Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning:
(is_child and (can_jumpslash or Fish)) or 
                (is_adult and Hover_Boots and has_bombchus and can_shield)

region_name: Field Near Lake Outside Fence Grotto
Field Near Lake Inside Fence Grotto
Field Far West Castle Town Grotto
